attributes.action: stop using the CPI  as a misleading measurement of cost of living or "inflation" when talking about the pay of all public sector workers .RPI is an honest indicator of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RPI and its predecessor has been used since 1914 to measure the rise in the cost of living it has been used as the measure when "inflation" has been referred to. The government,s use of CPI  when talking of wages and inflation comes very close to lying!
